snippet: In the trial over the ill-fated CityTime payroll project, a taxi tussle between a defendant and a juror was debated.
abstract: Second day of fraud trial concerning CityTime, New York City's ill-fated payroll modernization project, starts much as it had on first day--with unusual scrutiny of a juror; issues involving jury appear to overshadow testimony in the case against defendants Mark Mazer and Gerard Denault.
lead_paragraph: In the trial over the ill-fated CityTime payroll project, a taxi tussle between a defendant and a juror was debated.

headline.main: Jury Issues Overshadow Testimony in Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: Jury Issues Overshadow Testimony In Fraud Case
